adept.module

Interface ISentenceProcessor<T extends HltContent>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommittedBeliefTagger, NamedEntityTagger, OpinionTagger, PosTagger, SarcasmDetector, SyntacticChunker

    public interface ISentenceProcessor<T extends HltContent>
    The Interface ISentenceProcessor defines the interfaces that will be implemented by ADEPT modules that perform sentence-level processing. .

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<T> process(Sentence sentence)
      This definition of the process method takes a Sentence object as input and returns a list of HltContent objects which includes the results from text processing..
      long processAsync(Sentence sentence)
      This is asynchronous definition of the Process method.
      Boolean tryGetResult(long requestId, List<T> hltContents)
      This method is invoked multiple times as a polling mechanism to get the output from the asynchronous process method for a requestId.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        List<T> process(Sentence sentence)
                                   throws AdeptModuleException
        This definition of the process method takes a Sentence object as input and returns a list of HltContent objects which includes the results from text processing..
        Parameters:
        sentence - the sentence
        Returns:
        the list
        Throws:
        AdeptModuleException - the adept module exception

      • processAsync

        long processAsync(Sentence sentence)
                  throws AdeptModuleException
        This is asynchronous definition of the Process method. The invocation of this method returns a long 'requestId' as output parameter. This requestId is used to poll for the result of the asynchronous process..
        Parameters:
        sentence - the sentence
        Returns:
        the long
        Throws:
        AdeptModuleException - the adept module exception

      • tryGetResult

        Boolean tryGetResult(long requestId,
                   List<T> hltContents)
                     throws AdeptModuleException
        This method is invoked multiple times as a polling mechanism to get the output from the asynchronous process method for a requestId. The boolean return type indicates whether the output is ready or not..
        Parameters:
        requestId - the request id
        hltContents - the hlt contents
        Returns:
        the boolean
        Throws:
        AdeptModuleException - the adept module exception
